sentences.english: The closure construction for offshore dyke engineering is different from the closure for river.
sentences.chinese: 沿海堤壩工程的合龍，不同於江河截流。

sentences.english: That was one dent in the dam-like Berlin Wall, and a big one.
sentences.chinese: 柏林牆堤壩出現了凹陷，一個嚴重的凹陷。

sentences.english: The commune members went at the building of a dam with a will.
sentences.chinese: 社員們幹勁十足地建築一道堤壩。

sentences.english: The water deepened after the dam was built.
sentences.chinese: 堤壩建成之後，水就變深了。

sentences.english: They built a dam along the seashore to retain the seawater.
sentences.chinese: 他們沿海岸築起一道堤壩以攔住海水。

sentences.english: The stone cage , made of geonet , can prevent collapsing when being used in dike.
sentences.chinese: 用土工網製作石籠，應用於堤壩可以防止塌方。

sentences.english: The southern end of the dyke is captured in this astronaut photograph.
sentences.chinese: 這個堤壩的南端被宇航員用照片拍下來。

sentences.english: They riprapped the dykes of the reservoir with stone.
sentences.chinese: 他們用亂石基加固水庫的堤壩。

sentences.english: The floods caved in that dike.
The water broke loose when the dam burst.
At least 22 levees in the three flood-stricken states have already been topped by floodwaters this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週在三個受洪水侵襲的州有至少22個堤壩被淹沒。

sentences.english: Hundreds of thousands of people were evacuated as the river level rose and broke through waterlogged dikes and embankments.
sentences.chinese: 成千上萬人因水位上漲和堤壩浸水而疏散。

sentences.english: On the day the sluice gate was to be opened, a huge crowd gathered on the banks.
sentences.chinese: 在開閘放水的那一天，好些人來到了堤壩上。

sentences.english: A dam burst and flooded their villages.
sentences.chinese: 堤壩決口，淹沒了他們的村莊。

sentences.english: The dam rises 68 metres from the valley floor.
sentences.chinese: 山谷底築起一道68米高的堤壩。

definition: Tsing Ma Bridge (to Hong Kong Airport)
monkey (dialect)/little monkey (affectionate term for children, subordinates)
variant of 漁網|渔网[yu2 wang3]
strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
Andes mountain chain of South America
